alert.note: Alert for Clinch; Echols; Northern Ware; Southern Ware; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 5:50PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Echols, southern Ware, Clinch and northwestern Charlton Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 550 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Argyle to near Needmore. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Homerville, Fargo, Argyle, Stephen Foster State Park, Du Pont, Needmore, Manor and Race Pond. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Clinch; Echols; Northern Ware; Southern Ware; Western Charlton
